itunes:title: Episode 342 - DB Sports Companion Show 11/13/18 - Special Guest New Orleans Saints Defensive End Alex Okafor
title: Episode 342 - DB Sports Companion Show 11/13/18 - Special Guest New Orleans Saints Defensive End Alex Okafor
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by New Orleans Saints superstar Defensive End Alex Okafor live from Deuce McAllister's bar in NOLA.  Dan and Ross also chat about the debacle in Mexico City and the cancelation of the biggest game of the NFL sea...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by New Orleans Saints superstar Defensive End Alex Okafor live from Deuce McAllister's bar in NOLA.  Dan and Ross also chat about the debacle in Mexico City and the cancelation of the biggest game of the NFL season, Jimmy Butler getting traded to Philly, Le'veon Bell sitting out the season, and Dez Bryant going down in two days. #prayers4brad

Join Us On Drinkin' Bros Sports Page https://www.facebook.com/groups/DBSports/
